about_the_game:
Story:
In a quiet room, a man's eyes fall upon an intriguing weight loss program advertisement. Promising simplicity and effortless results, the program's tagline echoes in his mind: "Eat, Play, Lose Weight." Intrigued and hopeful, he places an order.

As the package arrives at his doorstep, anticipation fills the air. Opening it, he discovers a unique twist—a program that requires him to consume a ship, becoming a participant in a bizarre video game-like experience. With each level, he gains control over the vessel, venturing into the depths of his own body to confront and obliterate peculiar creatures lurking within.

Features:

  • 2D side-scrolling shmup: Engage in a gorgeous shoot 'em-up adventure as you navigate visually stunning environments.
  • Hand-drawn art style with flesh/gore theme: Immerse yourself in a surreal world brought to life through meticulously crafted hand-drawn artwork, combining beauty with grotesque elements.
  • Bullet hell: Test your reflexes and strategic thinking in intense battles against relentless waves of enemies and intricate bullet patterns.

Unleash your skills, dodge relentless barrages, and uncover the mysteries hidden within the depths of the protagonist's body. Will he triumph over the bizarre creatures or succumb to their onslaught? Dive into this twisted adventure, where weight loss takes an extraordinary form in an immersive bullet hell experience like no other.
